Instance.description: Situation for getting Sims to get to where they will start the welcome wagon situation.

TunableList.name: _bearer_recipes
TunableList.description: A list of recipes from which a random selection will be made and used by the fruitcake bearer to generate and carry a craftable into the Pre Welcome Wagon situation.

Tunable.description: Recipe that will be brought in during the Pre Welcome Wagon situation by the fruitcake-bearer.

Tunable.name: _door_knocker_situation_job
Tunable.description: The job for the situation door knocker. This sim will end up being the host for the situation.

Tunable.name: _fruitcake_bearer_situation_job
Tunable.description:
The job for the bearing of the vile nastiness known as...
...fruitcake...

Tunable.name: _number_of_neighbors
Tunable.description: The number of other neighbors to bring to the situation. If there aren't enough neighbors then none will be generated to bring.

Tunable.name: _other_neighbors_job
Tunable.description: The job for all of the other neighbors in the situation.

Tunable.name: _welcome_wagon_situation
Tunable.description: The actual welcome wagon situation that we want to start once we have actually gotten the Sims to where we want them to be.

TunableTuple.name: has_front_door_situation_starting_state
TunableTuple.display: Has Front Door Situation Starting State
TunableTuple.description: The first state of this situation in the case that the lot has a front door. If it does not then the Has No Front Door Situation Starting State will be started instead.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: has_no_front_door_situation_starting_state
TunableTuple.display: Has No Front Door Situation Starting State
TunableTuple.description: The first state of this situation in the case that the lot has no front door. Sims should be routing to the arrival spawn point.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.
